column1: Phil decided to stay a little longer, and as time passed it seemed if the stange little man had never been there, but for the other glass on the table.
Toward the end of his fourth hairy highball, while he was making wet ring on the table-top with the bottom of the glass, he became aware that he was not alone.
Haney swished the liquor in the bottom of his glass.
Got back to Balinas, and everything and fallen:broken poster frames with glass on the floor, file cabinets open or dumped onto the floor.
Endless second wondering if those huge windows would buckle and shower us with glass.
